trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>What's that? Back to help us hand out some more eggs? You are far too kind, friend! Needless to say, we would more than welcome your aid. Here, I have a freshly decorated batch ready to go at any time!

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>You can replay the gift-giving task from the quest “Hippity, Hoppity, Happily.” If fortune smiles upon you, you may even encounter individuals who were not present in your initial venture.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q1_000_000<tab>Begin handing out eggs?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q2_000_000<tab>Where will you hand out eggs?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_001<tab>By the markets.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_002<tab>By the Botanists' Guild.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_003<tab>By Nophica's Altar.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_004<tab>By the Whistling Miller.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A1_000_005<tab>By Apkallu Falls.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NICOLIAUX_000_010<tab>A decorated egg? For me? How thoughtful!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NICOLIAUX_000_011<tab>There's even a treat inside! Thank you ever so much.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_012<tab>Your efforts are sincerely appreciated. These seasonal celebrations bring so much joy to the children─and myself, I confess.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_013<tab>Still, I must say...it's been years since I've seen a traveler rabbit in the flesh. I never would have expected to encounter one here.

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_014<tab>What's that? That nomenclature is unfamiliar to you? Ah, in the North they are known more...colloquially...as “happy bunnies,” are they not? They're said to usher in smiles and good fortune...

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_015<tab>Before that─yes, since much older times─they were known as “traveler rabbits.” They have a habit of showing up at your side unannounced, then vanishing off somewhere before you know it. I recall seeing one in the Twelveswood when I was but a child...
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_016<tab>Ah, but forgive me... You have other places you must be. We can talk another time─pray relax and enjoy the festivities when your work is done.

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_020<tab>Why, I daresay the wood used to fashion those decorations was among the finest I've ever laid eyes on. As always, your eye for quality timber is simply unparalleled.

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_021<tab>You're far too kind, Master Bea─ I mean...my forest-loving, floppy-eared friend. Likewise, I have no doubt the wood rejoiced to find itself in the hands of one who understands it as well as you.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_022<tab>...Or should I say “paws”?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_023<tab>Ha!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_024<tab>Oh! If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How good it is to see you well.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_025<tab>An adventurer? I don't believe we've met...
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_026<tab>An egg for me? And what a charming little fellow carrying it. I accept your gift with gratitude.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_027<tab>How very clever you are! Though I did hear a rumor of some concern...

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_028<tab>Yes, a little bird told me that creatures bearing no small resemblance to you were running wild through the streets of Gridania, trampling our precious greenery...

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_029<tab>...And nibbling at the bark of our precious trees─a <var 1A 02 /var>most<var 1A 01 /var> disconcerting story if there is any truth to it.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_030<tab>C-Cluck! Cluck cluck! Cluck...
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_031<tab>If my intuition is not mistaken, it appears the little creature is apologizing to us in its own way.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_032<tab>Well, as long as you've learned your lesson, I do believe we can forgive and forget.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_033<tab>Thank you for the thoughtful gift, and the happiest of Hatching<var 1F /var>tides to you!

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_040<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It is always a pleasure to have you here in Gridania...and 'twould seem you've befriended some rather charming little helpers!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_041<tab>Why, what a lovely egg. How very kind of you.

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_042<tab>And there's the most toothsome-looking little cake inside! Do stop by the Canopy when we've finished here─I've a brew that will accompany it perfectly.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_043<tab>I should enjoy that, indeed!

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, on behalf of all Gridania, allow me to thank you and your little colleagues for making this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide so memorable. Once your work has concluded, I hope you will have time to relax and take in the cheer of the season.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_045<tab>You and your new friends are welcome to stop by for a cup of tea as well, should the mood strike you.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_100_045<tab>...Though I daresay you ought to claim a table sooner rather than later. These sweets will draw adventurers by the droves!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_050<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Fancy meeting you in a place like this!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_051<tab>What have we here? A decorative egg with a tasty treat inside? Hah! Thanks, little fellow─don't mind if I do!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_052<tab>Aren't you a cute one? And your fur is so soft and fluffy!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_100_052<tab>Thank you kindly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_053<tab>Perhaps you're wondering what we're doing here? It's nothing so exciting, I'm afraid─just performing routine maintenance on the airships. Normally, we'd send our new recruits, but Wedge here <var 1A 02 /var>insisted<var 1A 01 /var> we volunteer for the task ourselves.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_054<tab>Stay home and miss Gridania's famous Hatching<var 1F /var>tide egg hunt? Perish the thought!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_055<tab>Speaking of which...just who are these little critters, anyway?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_056<tab>Wh-Whoa! So <var 1A 02 /var>these<var 1A 01 /var> are the “happy bunnies” rumored to lead those they favor to happiness and good fortune!?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_2022ESTUSAGI_000_057<tab><squeak> <squeak>♪
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_058<tab>What's that, little friend? Happiness lies that way? Could my dearest Tataru be here for the festivities, too? I must go to her at once!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_059<tab>Damn it, Wedge! Come back here!

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_060<tab><sigh> Fool of a Lalafell... I'd best round him up so we can start the repairs <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> volunteered us for. Anyroad, thanks for the treats─I look forward to enjoying them with a cup of tea when our work is done. Till next time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_070<tab>'Tis an unexpected pleasure to meet thee here, my friend.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_001<tab>Urianger...?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_003<tab>A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_004<tab>A most <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>ceedingly <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>cellent Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee!

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_071<tab>Why, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...however didst thou know 'twas <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var>? Though mayhap my present company afforded thee a hint or two...
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_072<tab>And a happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_073<tab>Verily, by simply exchanging these words, I daresay I can feel a measure of jubilation in mine heart.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_074<tab>Art thou quite well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_075<tab>Ack! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s found us! I wasn't expecting a reunion.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_100_075<tab>...Not that we're up to anything, mind you! We simply wanted to experience Etheirys's famed seasonal celebrations.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_076<tab>It's been an exemplary learning experience thus far. And I swear we haven't taken any samples that anyone will miss!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_077<tab>To study such traditions is valuable indeed, for naught reflecteth a culture more clearly than what it hath codified in ritual.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_078<tab>...Pray tell, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─who are thy charming companions?
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_079<tab>F-For me? Well, thank you so much! Er, I think...
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_080<tab>Is this...a lemon muffin? <sniff> <sniff> But no...the aroma is entirely different.

TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_081<tab>Ornamental eggs and baked desserts? I see...thou art lending thine aid in spreading good cheer for the season. I am full glad to accept thy gifts.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_082<tab>...Pray forgive our haste, but my companions have much yet to see. A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee and thine.
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_060<tab>Thanks for the treat! Why, I do believe I'll try to bake up a batch myself when I get back to my kitchen!
TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_060<tab>Till we meet again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Perhaps even purposely, next time!
